title: Customer Experience Practical Competency Enhancement: Multimedia-Based Portuguese Project Learning via TikTok Videos

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Portuguese Grammar and Vocabulary Knowledge
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze Portuguese TikTok videos to explain at least three language-learning strategies based on signaling principles
Learners can produce Portuguese project outputs grounded in multimedia learning theory, applying at least two generative processing (generative thinking) elements
Learners can demonstrate five or more applications of Mayer’s Principles during the Portuguese video production process in PBL team projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
